COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0
STRING: [Phorni] “Today's your last day of practice at school,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6
STRING: Phorni asked me that as I left for school in the morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f4
STRING: [Phorni] “So that means you've found a partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20a
STRING: [Chris] “...Not yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm pretty sure you had to decide before
Natale, didn't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c
STRING: [Chris] “In the case of third year voice students, yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, do you have any other candidates?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a4
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d6
STRING: [Phorni] “...Any last resort?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ec
STRING: [Chris] “...I've got one, kinda. Ms. Cordell said she'd
figure something out for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x328
STRING: [Phorni] “As I thought. What about Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e
STRING: [Chris] “That's not out of the question... But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c
STRING: [Phorni] “Arie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x372
STRING: [Chris] “Not exactly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x390
STRING: [Phorni] “Arie thinks Torta would be good, doesn't she?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a6
STRING: [Chris] “That's what she said in the letter. But I'm the
one who has a problem with it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ce
STRING: [Phorni] “You mean, you think that Arie would actually
mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e4
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe, but more importantly, I feel Torta and I
are too close, and that bugs me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40c
STRING: [Phorni] “That's a given. You've been together since you
were kids. In other words, you're not sure that you can
keep that distance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x436
STRING: [Chris] “You're good at this, Phorni... That's probably it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x468
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm, that's understandable. So, what now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x488
STRING: [Chris] “If the student Ms. Cordell picked turned out to
be male, and a total stranger, things would be a lot
easier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c4
STRING: [Phorni] “＊sigh＊ Sure...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4da
STRING: [Chris] “I'll think about it when I get to school today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f8
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, have a nice day!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50e
STRING: Phorni sounded a little peeved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51a
STRING: She'd probably had enough of my endless complacency.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x530
STRING: I didn't blame her, of course, since even I couldn't
believe myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x546
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55c
STRING: Phorni was already looking outside the window, and
waved goodbye without saying a word.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5de
STRING: [Cordell] “Hi!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f4
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60a
STRING: I arrived at the usual time, but today Ms. Cordell was
early, apparently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x628
STRING: [Cordell] “Today's the final deadline that I set; have you
decided on a partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x648
STRING: [Chris] “...No, I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67a
STRING: [Cordell] “＊phew＊... As I expected. Then you won't
mind if I make the decision for you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69a
STRING: [Chris] “No. I'm not in any position to complain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6cc
STRING: [Cordell] “In that case, wait right here. I'll go get your
partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e2
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... As in, right now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x700
STRING: [Cordell] “I said there's no time, didn't I? Your partner is
already standing by.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x720
STRING: [Chris] “...If I'd said just now that I had found a partner,
what would you have done?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75c
STRING: [Cordell] “I knew you wouldn't. I only asked to be sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b6
STRING: With a tired smile, Ms. Cordell went out into the
hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7cc
STRING: ...I can't believe she'd made them wait.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d8
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ee
STRING: Would we get along, I wonder?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fa
STRING: I spent the few minutes before the door opened again
filling my head with these too-late thoughts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84c
STRING: [Cordell] “Sorry for the wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x862
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... It's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x878
STRING: And the figure behind her was all too familiar, all too
expected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b2
STRING: [Torta] “There was no other choice, so I came.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c8
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fa
STRING: [Cordell] “Considering your personality, I determined
that she was the best option. Is there a problem?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91a
STRING: [Chris] “...No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x938
STRING: [Cordell] “Excellent.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x970
STRING: [Chris] “Which means we'll practice right away, yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98e
STRING: [Cordell] “That's right. Chris, you're good at
sight-reading, aren't you? I've arranged Tortinita's song
for the Fortelle. You'll practice this version from now on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b8
STRING: [Chris] “S-Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d6
STRING: [Cordell] “Chris. Show some gratitude to Tortinita. And
Tortinita...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fe
STRING: [Torta] “Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1c
STRING: [Cordell] “Today I'll be watching both your
performances closely, so ask whatever questions you
need to in order to be able to practice even during
break times.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4e
STRING: [Torta] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6c
STRING: [Cordell] “Chris. What do you say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa82
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you so much...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa0
STRING: [Cordell] “Good. Now then, let's begin. Get ready, both
of you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xabc
STRING: Ms. Cordell then turned to Torta and continued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad0
STRING: [Cordell] “Have you practiced this already, a few times
perhaps?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb02
STRING: [Torta] “Yes. Practice, as well as copying out the score.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb18
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb36
STRING: [Cordell] “In that case, we'll use Tortinita's song.
Objections?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6a
STRING: [Chris] “None.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: I was in no position now to complain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8c
STRING: Still... To think that Torta was my partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba0
STRING: [Cordell] “You may have already practiced, but time isn't
on your side, is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc8
STRING: [Torta] “Guess not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbde
STRING: [Chris] “...Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfc
STRING: [Cordell] “Today I'll be watching both your
performances closely, so ask whatever questions you
need to in order to be able to practice even during
break times.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2e
STRING: [Torta] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4c
STRING: [Cordell] “Good. Now then, let's begin right away. Get
ready, both of you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc68
STRING: [Chris] “When you said 'today', you meant until lunch,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc90
STRING: [Cordell] “No, I meant it literally. I canceled all other
lessons today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb0
STRING: [Chris] “...Are you serious?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce2
STRING: [Cordell] “Haven't you realized yet that you're in trouble
if you aren't that serious?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd02
STRING: [Chris] “No, that's not what I meant...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd34
STRING: [Cordell] “Don't worry. Asino was overjoyed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd4a
STRING: [Chris] “...That's just like him.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7c
STRING: [Cordell] “Of course, I also have the consent of the
other students. So today, I'll watch you practice to my
heart's content.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9c
STRING: [Chris] “...Thank you. And Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdce
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde4
STRING: I thanked Torta once again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf0
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1a
STRING: Torta smiled and shook her head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5a
STRING: Practice went on till late that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe66
STRING: I couldn't help but feel that through this, everything had
been set in stone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7c
STRING: I didn't hate the idea of pairing up with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe88
STRING: As I'd told Phorni that morning, I didn't have confidence
in myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9e
STRING: The only person I could say such things to was Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb4
STRING: Containing her laughter, Ms. Cordell watched us
practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeca
STRING: And as a result of our day-long practice, things began to
come together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee0
STRING: The coming days would get a little busy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeec
STRING: I felt a bit guilty over the fact that this pairing up with
Torta was not something I'd chosen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf02
STRING: But I was familiar with that sense of guilt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0e
STRING: For all the hurt I'd caused, and all the hurt I was going
to cause.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf24
STRING: In the end, I could only think about one girl.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3a
STRING: And that girl's name was Arietta, not Tortinita, that was
all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf50
STRING: ...That was what I decided to think.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb8
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's make a simple final schedule.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfce
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1000
STRING: [Torta] “Don't tell me you were thinking of doing
nothing over winter break?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1020
STRING: [Chris] “If possible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1052
STRING: [Torta] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1068
STRING: [Chris] “What about the start of school, after the 4th?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109a
STRING: [Torta] “Now look here...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b0
STRING: [Chris] “I'll practice at home. Absolutely.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e2
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... In that case, do as you please.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f8
STRING: [Chris] “...Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112a
STRING: [Torta] “Don't be. I'll be busy with my own stuff too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: [Chris] “...I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: [Torta] “Then we'll practice in earnest starting from the
4th. Until then, make sure you practice my song
diligently.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1192
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b0
STRING: [Torta] “Save it. Just do your best for the graduation
recital, so that it'll boost my evaluation too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d0
STRING: From her tone, I could sense that Torta didn't believe a
word she just said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e6
STRING: Which made me very aware that I was being helped by
the people around me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11fc
STRING: The desire not to hurt them, the guilt...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1208
STRING: I had only ever thought of what suited me best, and
acted accordingly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1214
STRING: And as if to contradict my selfishness, these people
were selflessly working to help me out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122a
STRING: I felt so ashamed that I couldn't get myself to thank
Torta any more, or take any further action.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1290
STRING: [Phorni] “So, it turned out to be Torta, in the end.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a6
STRING: Phorni spoke in disbelief, and didn't say anything else
on the matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12bc
STRING: She didn't look pleased, nor was she angry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d2
STRING: She was just stunned, and then she smiled, almost
indulgently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12de
STRING: I had seen a lot of people smile today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ea
STRING: To the point where I imagined that they were laughing
at me.
